titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an John Maynard Keynes, [Ende November / Anfang Dezember 1928 ?]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original an der King's College Library in Cambridge; Kopie im BA. Publiziert (Letters, S. 126; deutsch: Briefe, S. 165; Cambridge Letters, S. 224; WiC, S. 163).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: I ve just finished my house that has kept me entirely busy these last two years. Now however I will have some holidays & naturaly want to see you again as soon as possible. The question is, would you mind seeing me. If not, write a line. I could come to England in the first days of December but not before, as I must first set to rights part of my anatomy. Enclosed you will find a few photos of my house & hope you wont be too much disgusted by its simplicity
